typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as double,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as boolean,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as double,
		delinq_2yrs as double,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as double,
		mths_since_last_delinq as double,
		mths_since_last_record as double,
		open_acc as double,
		pub_rec as double,
		revol_bal as double,
		revol_util as double,
		total_acc as double,
		initial_list_status as boolean,
		out_prncp as double,
		out_prncp_inv as double,
		total_pymnt as double,
		total_pymnt_inv as double,
		total_rec_prncp as double,
		total_rec_int as double,
		total_rec_late_fee as double,
		recoveries as double,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as double,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as double,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as double,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as double,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as string,
		total_bal_il as string,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as string,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as string,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string,
		skid as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionColumn: 'id',
	partitionBy('external', 32)) ~> source1
source(output(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt_inv as double,
		term as string,
		int_rate as double,
		installment as double,
		grade as string,
		sub_grade as string,
		emp_title as string,
		emp_length as string,
		home_ownership as string,
		annual_inc as double,
		verification_status as string,
		issue_d as string,
		loan_status as string,
		pymnt_plan as boolean,
		url as string,
		desc as string,
		purpose as string,
		title as string,
		zip_code as string,
		addr_state as string,
		dti as string,
		delinq_2yrs as string,
		earliest_cr_line as string,
		inq_last_6mths as string,
		mths_since_last_delinq as string,
		mths_since_last_record as string,
		open_acc as string,
		pub_rec as string,
		revol_bal as string,
		revol_util as string,
		total_acc as string,
		initial_list_status as string,
		out_prncp as string,
		out_prncp_inv as string,
		total_pymnt as string,
		total_pymnt_inv as string,
		total_rec_prncp as string,
		total_rec_int as string,
		total_rec_late_fee as string,
		recoveries as string,
		collection_recovery_fee as double,
		last_pymnt_d as string,
		last_pymnt_amnt as string,
		next_pymnt_d as string,
		last_credit_pull_d as string,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med as string,
		mths_since_last_major_derog as string,
		policy_code as string,
		application_type as string,
		annual_inc_joint as string,
		dti_joint as string,
		verification_status_joint as string,
		acc_now_delinq as string,
		tot_coll_amt as string,
		tot_cur_bal as string,
		open_acc_6m as string,
		open_il_6m as string,
		open_il_12m as string,
		open_il_24m as string,
		mths_since_rcnt_il as double,
		total_bal_il as double,
		il_util as string,
		open_rv_12m as double,
		open_rv_24m as string,
		max_bal_bc as string,
		all_util as double,
		total_rev_hi_lim as string,
		inq_fi as string,
		total_cu_tl as string,
		inq_last_12m as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1 derive(member_id = toInteger(null()),
		emp_title = sha2(256,emp_title,'mysalt'),
		column1 = 1,
		local1 := 'abc',
		local2 := '123') ~> MaskingPII
CachedLookups split(instr(term,'36') != 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> Terms@(term36, otherTerm)
Lookup1 derive(rowCounts = lookupSink#output().rowcounts,
		fundedAmntStddev = lookupSink#output().funded_amnt_stddev,
		fundedAmntAvg = lookupSink#outputs().funded_amnt_avg) ~> CachedLookups
MaskingPII, Aggregate1 lookup(column1 == aggkey,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
source2 aggregate(funded_amnt_stddev = round(stddev(funded_amnt),2),
		funded_amnt_avg = round(avg(funded_amnt),2),
		rowcounts = count(1),
		aggkey = max(1)) ~> Aggregate1
Terms@term36 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['term36.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> sink1
Terms@otherTerm sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['terms.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		id,
		member_id,
		loan_amnt,
		funded_amnt,
		funded_amnt_inv,
		term,
		int_rate,
		installment,
		grade,
		sub_grade,
		emp_title,
		emp_length,
		home_ownership,
		annual_inc,
		verification_status,
		issue_d,
		loan_status,
		pymnt_plan,
		url,
		desc,
		purpose,
		title,
		zip_code,
		addr_state,
		dti,
		delinq_2yrs,
		earliest_cr_line,
		inq_last_6mths,
		mths_since_last_delinq,
		mths_since_last_record,
		open_acc,
		pub_rec,
		revol_bal,
		revol_util,
		total_acc,
		initial_list_status,
		out_prncp,
		out_prncp_inv,
		total_pymnt,
		total_pymnt_inv,
		total_rec_prncp,
		total_rec_int,
		total_rec_late_fee,
		recoveries,
		collection_recovery_fee,
		last_pymnt_d,
		last_pymnt_amnt,
		next_pymnt_d,
		last_credit_pull_d,
		collections_12_mths_ex_med,
		mths_since_last_major_derog,
		policy_code,
		application_type,
		annual_inc_joint,
		dti_joint,
		verification_status_joint,
		acc_now_delinq,
		tot_coll_amt,
		tot_cur_bal,
		open_acc_6m,
		open_il_6m,
		open_il_12m,
		open_il_24m,
		mths_since_rcnt_il,
		total_bal_il,
		il_util,
		open_rv_12m,
		open_rv_24m,
		max_bal_bc,
		all_util,
		total_rev_hi_lim,
		inq_fi,
		total_cu_tl,
		inq_last_12m,
		rowCounts,
		fundedAmntStddev,
		fundedAmntAvg
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> sink2
Aggregate1 sink(mapColumn(
		funded_amnt_stddev,
		funded_amnt_avg,
		rowcounts
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	saveOrder: 1) ~> lookupSink

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn2 derive(Location = :local1[1],
		Asset = iif(size(:local1)<3,toString(null()),:local1[2]),
		Attribute = iif(size(:local1)<3,:local1[2],:local1[3]),
		local1 := regexSplit(Resource,'\\s|_|\\.|-')) ~> DerivedColumn1
SurrogateKey1 derive(Resource = iif(sk % 2 == 0,'Atlanta-CKT606.Battery',iif(sk==3,'Atlanta.Battery','Atlanta.Bus2_Volts'))) ~> DerivedColumn2
source1 keyGenerate(output(sk as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
DerivedColumn1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('external', 16)) ~> source1
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionColumn: 'movie',
	partitionBy('external', 16)) ~> source2
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['output/demoout1/movies2021.csv']) ~> source3
AlterRow1 derive(year = 2021) ~> DerivedColumn1
source2 filter(year == 2021) ~> Filter1
source1 alterRow(updateIf(year==1980)) ~> AlterRow1
source3 aggregate(rowcount = count(1)) ~> RowCount
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movies2021.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 2) ~> sink2
RowCount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movies2021rowcount.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 3) ~> sink3

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> newFile
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> existingTable
newFile derive(fingerprint = sha2(256,columns())) ~> rowSignature
existingTable derive(fingerprint1 = sha2(256,columns())) ~> rowSignature1
rowSignature, rowSignature1 exists(fingerprint == fingerprint1,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 50) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 filter(year == 1980) ~> Filter1
source1 derive(currentTime = '_'+regexReplace(toString(currentTimestamp()),'\\s| |\\.|-|:','')) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 derive(releasedate = iif(year == 1980,'_'+toString(:local1)+right('0'+toString(toInteger((random(1)*12)+1)),2)+right('0'+toString(toInteger((random(2)*12)+1)),2),'_20200311'),
		local1 := year) ~> DerivedColumn2
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowFolderUrlColumn:'currentTime',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowFolderUrlColumn:'releasedate',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
